name: BUTTER MASHED POTATOES BALLS Recipe | Rida Aftab | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for BUTTER MASHED POTATOES BALLS Recipe: Boiled Potatoes ½ kg Butter 50g Milk 1 cup Cream ½ cup Finely Chopped Garlic 1 tsp Oregano ½ tsp Salt ½ tsp Black Pepper ½ tsp Parsley or Green Coriander 2 tbsp Cheddar Cheese ½ cup Eggs 2 Bread Crumbs as required Oil for frying
instructions: First mash ½ kg boiled potatoes and then add 1 cup milk, 50g butter, ½ cup cream. Add 1 tsp finely chopped garlic, ½ tsp oregano, ½ tsp black pepper Add½ cup cheddar cheese and make balls of it. Now fry it in heated oil with 2 eggs and bread crumbs after dipping it.
